articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT The Graph
Learn more about the recently announced Graph AdvocatesDAO tomorrow, April 12 at 9AM PST
🎙️
Several Graph Advocates are joining a Space to discuss the Graph Advocates program, Graph AdvocatesDAO, & the future of community grants!
📅 Set a reminder:

The Graph: Introducing Graph AdvocatesDAO—the first DAO in The Graph ecosystem.
Graph AdvocatesDAO is a step towards decentralizing grants. The DAO now leads community grants & the Advocates Program 🧑‍🚀
Apply to join @GraphAdvocates & learn how you can join the DAO!
 https://thegraph.com/blog/advocates-dao

articles.description:
RT iamnico.eth (🥩,🔨)(📹 , ⛏️)
Move over @Zoom , there's a new player in town and it's #web3
We are gonna try this for our next @tenderize_me team sync 🚀🎥🤩
Livepeer Video Services: 💡 #Web3 Spotlight 💡
The @Huddle01com team are trailblazers. They built the world's first video meetings platform that leverages decentralized, blockchain infrastructure. 
This is their story 👇
 https://livepeer.com/blog/how-huddle01-built-the-worlds-first-web3-meeting-app

articles.description:
RT The Auth0 Lab
Signing in with Ethereum wallets is now an available option for all Auth0 clients! A big thanks to our friends (frens?) at @SpruceID.
We're excited to see how the Web3 world continues to unlock new tools for identity, privacy, and security: https://auth0.com/blog/sign-in-with-ethereum-siwe-now-available-on-auth0/

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | nader.sol
I've been building an app using @ArweaveTeam as the storage layer, but instead of storing files I'm storing strings of text (think tweets)
Instead of storing directly to Arweave I'm using @BundlrNetwork & from what I can tell is around 20X🤯 cheaper for up to 280 bytes
1/n 🧵
